title: Courtyard of al-Sultan Barquq's mausoleum at the Northen Cemetery
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Mosquée Barkouk au désert - Sahn côté Sud. Translation of photographer's description: Barkouk Mosque in the desert - Sahn South Side. -  Collector's description:  28) Barkouk (mosq.funéraire) (av.trav.) Translation of collector's note: 28) Barkouk (mosque mausoleum) (before construction work). Convent and Mausoleum of Sultan Farag.
location: Al-Qarafa al-Kubra; Al-Qāhirah governorate; Egypt; Africa
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Courtyard of al-Sultan Barquq's mausoleum at the Northen Cemetery
